message:
لو سمحتوا 
لو حد لسه طالب وعايز يبدا يتعلم Itشبكات ايه الكورسات الي المفروض ياخدها ويبدا يذاكرها من دلوقت 
شكرا مقدما

data.message:
When I was a student, several students took the CCNA certificates and were very happy with them. Consider looking at the certificate materials and studying in general whether you decide to take the certificate or not.

If you prefer courses, since this is a popular path, it should be easy to find training centers that can give you the certificate course(s) as well.
there's another course called CompTIA Network+, I highly recommend this one as it will explain all the basics of networking away from any vendor based course/certification like CCNA

Start by learning Linux, choose an OS that is parent to make others such as Open Suse or Debian (my favourite). Then do a Linux networking course such as https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/lfcs-linux-networking/table-of-contents
If you need access to courses like that online ping me
